name: Native SigScan
longdescription:
This plugin allows to scan analyzed binaries for signatures or create them. Supports both normal signatures (e.g. 49 28 15 ? ? 30) and commonly used code signatures (e.g. "\x49\x28\x15\x00\x00\x30", "xxx??x").

As title suggests, it is coded in C++ and utilizes Binary Ninja's native API. For this reason this plugin serves just as a loader for the [actual plugin](https://github.com/rikodot/binja_native_sigscan).

Currently works on Windows only!
